Each Row is a fraction of a page or 1 whole page. Different Row Types include 1/4 (a quarter of a page), 1/3, 2/4, 2/3, and 1 (whole page). Get started by clicking "Add Row". PLEASE NOTE: The last PDF page will always have a contact info panel that is a 1/4 row so for the last page you should only have a total of 3/4 or 2/3 of Rows. If your last page needs a full page add a blank PDF page, title it appropriately (e.g. Value Brief BLANK) and simply click "Publish". In "Pages" when you are putting together each PDF Page for your complete document have this blank PDF Page be the last Page.
